titles.title: A bill to clarify the tariff classification of certain plastic flat goods.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8253)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/29/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide a duty with respect to certain plastic flat goods with an outer surface area of not less than 20 percent leather.
